Sequence Information.Family: Belongs to the class IIb microcin
Sequence Information.Target Organism: No MICs found in DRAMP database
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: No hemolysis information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Comments: All Belongs to the class IIb microcins such as MccE492 have a Ser-rich C-terminal region and they may carry a siderophore-type PTM.
